summary: Increases the value of stuff you can steal in rich people's houses and dwemer ruins, making them worth looting
descriptionHtml:
"Valuable Clutter" is a very basic hackjob plugin that increases the value of silver and dwemer jugs, bowls, plates, platters, etc. by 10. A Silver Bowl that was worth 5 gold is now worth 50 gold, and so on. This is to ensure that, when you break into a rich person's house, you will be able to loot all their silverware and sell it to a fence, in order to make at least some money, in case you aren't skilled enough to open lockboxes yet.

Does not require any DLC
Does not include items from DLC
Will conflict with mods that change the stats of silver or dwemer clutter
author: me
